It's an avalanche all right, but the boulders arerolling up the mountain! Panicked, you runtoward Katu. The boulders are coming right atyou. At near zero gravity they're being pulledtoward the Black Sun. "You've got to run down!" Dr. Vivaldi shouts.But the boulders have cut off your escape. Theonly thing you can do is run up the mountain,trying to keep out of their path. You're runninghigher and faster, leaping fifty feet at a time.Ahead of you, Katu flies off the mountain. Beforeyou can stop yourself your feet lose touch withthe ground, and you're in the air, being swepthigher and higher, straight toward the Black Sun! You've read that a black hole might somehowbe an entrance to another universe. If only thatwere possible! It's your only chance once youreach the Black Sun. A chance in a millionmaybe, but still a chance . . .

The End
